languages.text: "От плебсов исходит буро-желтое пламя. Еще немного, и отчаяние и голод захлестнуют их с головой, сожгут изнутри, сдавят страх перед смертью... и превратятся в грязно-багровую бурю".

"These peasants are engulfed in flames of maroon and yellow. In a few moments, despair and hunger will overwhelm them, burn them from within, smother their fear of death... and become a storm of grimy crimson."
languages.original_text: "От плебсов исходит буро-желтое пламя. Еще немного, и отчаяние и голод захлестнуют их с головой, сожгут изнутри, сдавят страх перед смертью... и превратятся в грязно-багровую бурю".

languages.text: 「この農民たちは、マルーンと黄色の炎に飲み込まれています。まもなく絶望と飢えは彼らを包み込み、蒸し焼きにし、死への恐怖を抑圧し…汚れた真紅の嵐となることでしょう。」
languages.original_text: "These peasants are engulfed in flames of maroon and yellow. In a few moments, despair and hunger will overwhelm them, burn them from within, smother their fear of death... and become a storm of grimy crimson."

traits.locale_text: 「この農民たちは、マルーンと黄色の炎に飲み込まれています。まもなく絶望と飢えは彼らを包み込み、蒸し焼きにし、死への恐怖を抑圧し…汚れた真紅の嵐となることでしょう。」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ces paysans sont dévorés par des flammes marron et jaunes. D'ici peu, le désespoir et la famine vont les submerger, les brûler de l'intérieur, étouffer leur crainte de la mort... et se transformer en une tempête d'un pourpre crasseux. »
languages.original_text: "These peasants are engulfed in flames of maroon and yellow. In a few moments, despair and hunger will overwhelm them, burn them from within, smother their fear of death... and become a storm of grimy crimson."

traits.locale_text: « Ces paysans sont dévorés par des flammes marron et jaunes. D'ici peu, le désespoir et la famine vont les submerger, les brûler de l'intérieur, étouffer leur crainte de la mort... et se transformer en une tempête d'un pourpre crasseux. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这群民众已经被黄褐色的火焰吞没。用不了多久，绝望和饥饿就会淹没他们，从内心深处焚烧他们，扼住他们对死亡的恐惧……之后，便会演变成一场血红色的风暴。”
languages.original_text: "These peasants are engulfed in flames of maroon and yellow. In a few moments, despair and hunger will overwhelm them, burn them from within, smother their fear of death... and become a storm of grimy crimson."

traits.locale_text: “这群民众已经被黄褐色的火焰吞没。用不了多久，绝望和饥饿就会淹没他们，从内心深处焚烧他们，扼住他们对死亡的恐惧……之后，便会演变成一场血红色的风暴。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Bauern sind umgeben von Flammen in Rötlich-braun und Gelb. In wenigen Augenblicken werden Verzweiflung und Hunger sie übermannen, von innen verbrennen, ihre Angst vor dem Tod überdecken ... und ein Sturm aus schmutzigem Dunkelrot wird entstehen."
languages.original_text: "These peasants are engulfed in flames of maroon and yellow. In a few moments, despair and hunger will overwhelm them, burn them from within, smother their fear of death... and become a storm of grimy crimson."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Bauern sind umgeben von Flammen in Rötlich-braun und Gelb. In wenigen Augenblicken werden Verzweiflung und Hunger sie übermannen, von innen verbrennen, ihre Angst vor dem Tod überdecken ... und ein Sturm aus schmutzigem Dunkelrot wird entstehen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Estos plebeyos están envueltos en llamas granates y amarillas. En un rato, los abrumarán la desesperación y el hambre, los quemarán desde dentro, sofocarán su miedo a la muerte... y se convertirán en una tormenta de carmesí sucio».
languages.original_text: "These peasants are engulfed in flames of maroon and yellow. In a few moments, despair and hunger will overwhelm them, burn them from within, smother their fear of death... and become a storm of grimy crimson."

traits.locale_text: «Estos plebeyos están envueltos en llamas granates y amarillas. En un rato, los abrumarán la desesperación y el hambre, los quemarán desde dentro, sofocarán su miedo a la muerte... y se convertirán en una tormenta de carmesí sucio».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu taşralılar, bordo ve sarı alevlerle sarmalanmış. Birkaç dakika içinde umutsuzluk ve açlık; onları bunaltacak, içten yakacak, ölüm korkularını bastıracak ve... Pis bir kızıl fırtınaya dönüşecek."
languages.original_text: "These peasants are engulfed in flames of maroon and yellow. In a few moments, despair and hunger will overwhelm them, burn them from within, smother their fear of death... and become a storm of grimy crimson."

traits.locale_text: "Bu taşralılar, bordo ve sarı alevlerle sarmalanmış. Birkaç dakika içinde umutsuzluk ve açlık onları bunaltacak, içten yakacak, ölüm korkularını bastıracak ve... Pis bir kızıl fırtınası hâline gelecek."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
